Our Heritage

Transforming Heritage Into Style

Explore Our Collection

Artisanal Craftsmanship

Handwoven Excellence

Our Process

Modern Design

Culture Meets Fashion

Shop Now

Our Philosophy

Our Vision

To lead a new wave of Afrocentric fashion by making Aṣọ Òkè a staple in everyday wear — from street style to luxury fashion.

Our Mission

To create premium, stylish Aṣọ Òkè pants that celebrate culture, empower local artisans, and inspire confidence in every wearer.

Why Choose Shortnhat

We blend tradition with innovation to create pieces that stand out in both quality and design

Artisanal Quality

Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations.

Modern Design

Contemporary patterns and styles that respect tradition while embracing current fashion trends.

Cultural Heritage

Each design tells a story, preserving and celebrating the rich cultural heritage of the Yoruba people.

Sustainable Focus

Commitment to ethical production and sustainable practices that respect our environment.

Our Journey

From inspiration to global recognition, our path of innovation and growth

Our Inspiration

Discovering the beauty and versatility of Aṣọ Òkè and recognizing its potential in contemporary fashion.

The Beginning

Partnering with local artisans to create our first collection of Aṣọ Òkè pants, combining traditional craftsmanship with modern design.

Innovation

Introducing contemporary design elements while preserving the essence of traditional Aṣọ Òkè patterns and techniques.

Global Recognition

Gaining recognition for our unique blend of tradition and modernity in the fashion industry.

What Makes Us Different

Our commitment to quality, design, and cultural heritage sets us apart

Authentic Craftsmanship

We work directly with skilled weavers and tailors who treat each piece like art. Every stitch tells a story.

Modern Fit, Cultural Soul

Our pants are tailored for comfort and confidence, blending traditional textures with urban designs for both men and women.

Limited Editions

We release our pants in exclusive drops, ensuring each piece is unique and special.

Sustainable & Ethical

We produce in small batches, support local artisans, and promote mindful fashion.

Who We Design For

  • Cultural creatives
  • Afro-futurists
  • Lovers of bold, original fashion
  • Anyone proud of their African heritage — or curious to wear it

"Aṣọ Òkè is not just fabric. It's a statement, a memory, and a movement. We turn it into pants you can wear anywhere."

Our Inspiration

The idea for our brand was born from a simple, powerful question:

"Why should our heritage only be worn at weddings?"

Our Grandparents' Wardrobes

Where Aṣọ Òkè was worn with pride and grace

Our City Streets

Full of energy, culture, and bold self-expression

A New Generation

Proud of their roots but bold enough to reimagine them

Get In Touch

We'd love to hear from you and answer any questions

Based in Lagos, Nigeria

Shipping nationwide and internationally.
